entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • continuation of androidx.collection.ArrayMapKt is defined multiple times #18665 #20561
  • Android - CollectionView DataTemplate with ContentView Content binding causes error when scrolling #20560
  • Collection View scroll is laggy #20557
  • Double border in MacOS and iOS #20556
  • [Testing] NativeAOT: Controls.Sample.UITests crashing or hanging #20553
    .NET 9 Planning
  • `Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Shapes.PathGeometryConverter` does not load `Path` `Data` from Resource files in Release mode, but works fine in Debug mode #20552
  • remove_RequestedThemeChanged cause null reference #20551
  • Endless measure cycle on Android when WebView is placed inside Frame #20550
  • Shell.Current.FlyoutIsPresented = true still does not toggle the first time on Android #20549
  • The User Interface moved up when the keyboard appears in Android platform #20548
  • StackLayout Orientation binding is a real mess #20545
  • The navigation menu does not display the current cursor position correctly #20539
  • On iOS, CollectionView Header size changed causes overlap #20538
  • [Testing] Re-enable/move TrackColorInitializesCorrectly/TrackColorUpdatesCorrectly to Appium #20535
    Backlog
  • [Testing] Re-Enable/move DoneClosesKeyboard to Appium #20533
    Backlog

Closed

  • [Regression] [Android] [Maps] Map locks up after adding ~200-300 locations to Polyline #20532
  • Add support for RelativeBindingSource to TypedBinding #20101
  • Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Maps control is currently broken on Android #20317

PullRequests

Created

  • [net8.0.] Update net8.0 with main #20563
  • [iOS] Adjust Keyboard Scrolling for Sticky Headers and Fix Bottom Content Inset #20562
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, area/keyboard
  • [Android] DatePicker Focus and Unfocus events #20547
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, control-datetimepicker
  • Updated Development guide #20543
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Testing] Added UITest to validate the Switch OnColor property #20542
    area/controls 🎮, area/testing, control-switch, testing-flakiness
  • [WIP] NativeAOT: Stand up UI testing #20541
    area/testing
  • Prepare the FabricBot config for migration to Policy Service #20540
    community ✨
  • [iOS] Button CharacterSpacing Fix #20537
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-button

Merged

  • Merge branch 'main' into `net9.0` #20555
  • Add support for relative binding sources to TypedBinding #20415
    area/Xaml </>
  • Stable 8.0.7 SR2 branding #20554
  • Temporarily Remove Tests #20536
    area/testing
  • Remove allocation from Color.TryParse #20446
  • Bump to latest VisualTestUtils #20525
  • Fix connectivity broadcast receiver never triggered on android 14.0/34+ #19968
    platform/android 🤖, area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • [Android] Make Flyout footer aware of header/content margin #19303
    platform/android 🤖, area/shell 🐢, stale

Updated

  • Bump the windowsappsdk group with 3 updates #20460
  • Add the multi-project template #20365
    area/templates 📄, .NET 8 SR3
  • Enable now passing tests and add some TableView categories #20531
    area/testing, area/ListView
  • [Trimming] Fix remaining trimming warnings related to XAML parsing #20474
  • Restructured CodeBehindGenerator pipeline #20524
  • [Core][Hosting] Resolve handler services through registered service types #20298
    area/hosting 🧩
  • [iOS] Fix gestures in Label Spans #15544
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/gestures
  • [XC] only generate the services that'll be used #19945
    area/Xaml </>
  • [Windows] Fix performance issue using Shadows #18337
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️
  • [Android] Fix Ripple effect with custom background (alternative to #17821) #20412
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • Fix Shell.NavBarIsVisible property #20173
    area/Xaml </>, area/shell 🐢
  • [iOS] NullReferenceException for Span GridItemsLayout fix #20492
    area/layout 🔲, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • Add new Keyboards for Prompt #20194
    t/enhancement ☀️, do-not-merge, community ✨, area/keyboard
  • [iOS] Shell toolbar items #20510
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢, community ✨
  • Remove Switch On/Off content #20487
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-switch
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #19848
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
